title: Principals and vice-principals
context: §302A-605 Principals and vice-principals. Principals and vice-principals shall meet the department&rsquo;s certification requirements. [L 1996, c 89, pt of §2; am L 2000, c 31, §1; am L 2001, c 256, §2 and c 287, §1; am L 2010, c 34, §2; am L 2011, c 75, §2; am L 2014, c 232, §8]
